pageContext.claim: “I watched Bill Clinton saying, this is the craziest thing I've ever seen.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump takes this comment out context. Bill Clinton’s remark on Oct. 3 about “the craziest thing I’ve ever seen” did not refer to the Affordable Care Act.  Instead, he was talking about the fact that people who did not qualify for insurance subsidies did not have a way to buy into Medicare or Medicaid. He noted that his wife, Hillary Clinton, had a plan to fix that defect.
